constituent: exertion, village stocks, rabbit, bound up, human legs, power, muscle, arnold
heisigStory: Rabbit . . . muscle. Notice how the last stroke of rabbit is stretched out to underlie the element for muscle.
koohiiStory1: When RABBITS hop around, they EXERT tremendous force using their MUSCULAR legs.
koohiiStory2: The energizer bunny's exertion of power keeps going and going...
